_source.short_desc: TriMed offers a fully integrated software suite including EHR, PM, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, & Telemedicine.
_source.long_desc: TriMed offers a complete software suite which includes Electronic Health Records, Practice Management, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, and Telemedicine. Our products are fully integrated, so all modules seamlessly work together for your practice. Extremely robust. Very customizable. Template driven. We build our software around your workflow, not the other way around.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is per provider, with cost reduction for mid-levels and part time providers.
_source.target_audience:
TriMed serves independent practices across the United States, ranging in size from 1 provider to 350+ providers.

"Together, we serve those who serve others."

category_features.name: Claims Management
category_features.definition: Automates the entire process of creating and submitting claims.

category_features.name: Claims Scrubbing
category_features.definition: Clean up of claims prior to their submission, while validating to determine claims are appropriate and accurate

category_features.name: Code & Charge Entry
category_features.definition: Assigning monetary value to patients' accounts as per medical codes and appropriate fee schedule.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Insurance Eligibility Verification
category_features.definition: Checking eligibility of patients for different insurance claims.

category_features.name: Invoice History
category_features.definition: Store and view prior invoices for each account/client

category_features.name: Practice Management
category_features.definition: Managing day-to-day operations of a medical practice such as scheduling appointments, generating reports and more.

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.name: Remittance Advice
category_features.definition: Document insurance payer providing an explanation of benefits (EOB).

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Improve financial performance, access transparent billing services, correct operational inefficiencies and get paid faster.
related_products.features: NextGen Financial Suite is a revenue-boosting platform that includes revenue cycle management (RCM) services and medical billing services, which combine innovative technology and billing expertise to help your practice collect every dollar you earn. With it, you can free up resources to focus on higher-value activities and reduce administrative costs.  Our predictive rules engine ensures that 98% of claims are accepted and paid after the first submission.

related_products.short_desc: Medical billing and practice management solution that helps manage claims, appointments, patient check-ins, reporting and more.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: At only $99/month, our All-In-One Chiropractic EHR software allows you to manage your entire practice from a single screen.
related_products.features: Our cloud-based practice management platform enables medical practices to improve operational processes with appointment scheduling, email reminders, billing, electronic claims submission and complete revenue cycle management services. Our team of certified billers and coders can increase your profitability by up to 20% while reducing administrative costs. ChiroFusion currently provides billing software and services to over 10,000 healthcare practices nationwide.

related_products.short_desc: With DrChrono RCM, you will see an improvement of clean claim rates, speedy turnaround on denials, and improved cash flow.
related_products.features: DrChrono's Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) can help you maintain income stability while giving you more time to focus on patient care. Our team of dedicated billing experts, in-house coding compliance officers, and certified medical coders handle the complete lifecycle of your medical claims the moment your patients walk into your clinic. DrChrono provides high quality yet affordable billing services and true transparency to your financial health with full insight on collection 24/7.

related_products.short_desc: Enables interactive online eligibility verification, claims submission, and reporting for a low subscription fee.
related_products.features: NueMD is no longer available for purchase

related_products.short_desc: Medical practice management solution that helps businesses with insurance billing, CMS 1500 forms filling, payment tracking, and more.
related_products.features: Speedy  Claims is possibly the easiest to use software available anywhere for billing your patients and insurance companies whether  by paper or electronically. An easy to use point and click interface showing the actual CMS 1500 form on the screen makes filling out a claim simple and coupled with our error checking scrubber makes it accurate and powerful.  Try us free for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: Independent billers or established billing companies looking for a software partner will improve efficiency, profitability, and RCM.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based Medical Billing system is easy to learn, customizable, and flexible. The entire claims process, from charge capture to full reimbursement, can be managed with single sign-on (SSO) for central billing offices. Easily assign ICD-10 codes, automated eligibility checks and ERAs, configurable reporting, online patient bill pay, and mobile apps for iOS and Android. Plus, connect with our Scheduling tool for a fully-integrated Practice Management (PM) solution.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Compulink Healthcare Solutions is an integrated hybrid medical solution that provides medical service providers wide functionalities.
related_products.features: Compulink's Advantage SMART Practice? is an all-in-one database EHR solution for specialty practices such as optometry, ophthalmology, orthopaedics, mental health, and more. Available cloud-based or server, Advantage includes smart features to help speed documentation and streamline practice workflow, including: specialty specific EHR, practice management, telehealth, patient engagement, eFax, EPCS, imaging/PACS, lab integration, inventory, optical POS (for eyecare), MIPS, e-commerce, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: MedicsPremier: excellent for any size setting; multiple tax IDs, comprehensive EDI, scheduling, reports/analytics. Great also for RCMs.
similar_products.features:
MedicsPremier is a highly comprehensive financial/revenue cycle/operations/mobility platform that drives maximized revenue from insurance payers and patients while creating extraordinary, hands-off   efficiencies.

Wide-ranging EDI, 2021 E/M coding, NCCI edits, out-of-network alerts, tools for capturing patient responsibility amounts, powerful scheduling that works to protect revenue in advance, wide-ranging, user-defined financial/operational analytics/dashboards/KPIs.

similar_products.short_desc: AZZLY Rize is an all-in-one addiction treatment and behavioral health EHR/PM/RCM solution, for small, medium, and large organizations.
similar_products.features: Leading Billing & Claims solution for behavioral and addiction treatment reimbursements. Our auto billing software eliminates human error, the #1 cause of rejected claims. A dynamic chargemaster populates claim details based on appointment/encounter type, ensuring accurate coding. AZZLY Rize was designed by billers for billers. Bill 7 days of charges in 30 seconds. Integrated clearinghouse. Easy! Professional and Institutional. Unlimited Modifiers and Coding. One screen view. Get paid faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Remedly billing software seamlessly complements the workflow of billers and coders.
similar_products.features:
Remedly billing software seamlessly complements the workflow of billers and coders. It helps billers eliminate time consuming, repetitive tasks. It empowers billers to process more claims faster and spend most of their time on leveraging their expertise to get customers paid what they deserve.

See for yourself why Remedly has the best billing solution on the market as recognized by Gartner Software Advice.

similar_products.short_desc: A 360 Laboratory Information System. A state-of-the-art but simple user interface for efficient clinical testing and Billing.
similar_products.features:
Prolis is a comprehensive laboratory management system designed to outperform clinically with up to date automated Billing for reference, physician office, veterinary and hospital labs of all sizes. Our lab software drives efficiency by automating time-consuming routine tasks, thus enabling you to excel your organization, in the modern laboratory medicine.
Engineered to serve a number of functions in the fast-paced field of medical science and patient care, PROLIS is the LIS for laboratories.

Through our knowledge and expertise, we empower revenue cycle companies to dynamically grow their business.

Our automated, efficient medical billing system benefits both your practice and your patients. Whether it is taking online payments or making the most of claims scrubbing and clearinghouse integration in your EHR, IMS's complete RCM solution streamlines and accelerates your entire billing process.

related_categories.description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) software helps parents, teachers and therapists monitor, influence and document changes in the behavior of individuals with autism spectrum disorders that undergo treatment based on learning theory.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Chiropractic software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Chiropractic tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Claims Processing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Claims Processing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Claims Processing software automates insurance claims management, electronic submissions, and collections. These applications offer a full feature suite of efficient claims processing management tools along with integrated accounting and customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. Claims Processing software offers real-time processing and reporting on the administrative and revenue generation activities for insurance industry firms, employee health plans and benefit managers. They cater to a variety of product sectors including life, health, automotive, COBRA, workers compensation, employer liability and others. Claims Processing software is related to Insurance Policy software and Medical Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mental Health software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mental Health tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mental Health software handles activities such as patient record keeping, billing, and scheduling for mental health facilities. Typically, Mental Health applications offer a variety of flexible features, which assist in the management and organization of patient records, progress notes, billing and invoicing, and staff and appointment scheduling. Mental health clinics use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including patient reporting generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Mental Health software is related to Human Services software, Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Medical Record (EMR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations with at least 40 users. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
similar_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
similar_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

similar_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
similar_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

similar_products.short_desc: Our award-winning EHR gives providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
similar_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

similar_products.short_desc: CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow.
similar_products.features:
CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow. Charts helps physicians become more productive and profitable, while maintaining adaptability and adjusting to the frequent changes in healthcare reform.

Our MU-certified EHR that features real-time patient flows, rich patient summaries, built-in templates, and time-saving clinical documentation to help you treat more patients every day, more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect and share current health information from medical records, labs, pharmacies, devices, apps, and patient portals
similar_products.features: Human API is a real-time health intelligence platform enabling companies to build new solutions that deliver better experiences to customers. We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management, EHR, and billing services for behavioral, mental, and chemical health. Cloud-based, feature-rich, affordable.
similar_products.features: Feature- for-feature, the best value in EHRs.  Exclusively designed for behavioral and mental health providers, Procentive is trusted by thousands of providers to provide the software and services they need to manage their businesses, stay compliant, and be more effective.  Comprehensive, yet easy to use, Procentive EHR is cloud-based and ONC certified.

similar_products.short_desc: AlexiaHtC is a new and affordable EMR/EHR, that is, Internet electronic medical record/electronic health record.
similar_products.features: AlexiaHTC is a modern, integrated, and affordable medical application for solo doctors, small practices, and independent nurse practitioners: EMR/EHR, E-Prescribing, Telemedicine, Medical Billing, Imaging DICOM VIEWER, Laboratory Integration, Provider Connectivity, and Patient Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusion is an EMR built specifically to help OTs, PTs, & SLPs spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.
similar_products.features:
From Pediatrics to Geriatrics, Fusion EMR does it all for PTs, OTs & SLPs Practices! Features include billing, scheduling, waitlists, insights, teletherapy, documentation, and more to streamline your clinic!

Thousands of therapists across the country trust Fusion's EMR to make them (and their practices) more efficient.

Sign up for a free demo of Fusion today to find out how you can spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.

similar_products.short_desc: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers.
similar_products.features: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers. Reduce time at intake with the client portal. Manage individual and group appointments, and meet your clients in person or through integrated Telehealth. Complete quick and easy charting with smart-fill and speech to text functionality. Set up autopay and require payment prior to your session to increase revenue. Schedule a demo today to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: TenEleven's electronic Clinical Record (eCR) solution provides the framework to thrive in a performance-based payment system.
similar_products.features: TenEleven Group is a software and services company, focused on providing solutions for health and human services agencies to manage their end-to-end business process. electronic Clinical Record (eCR) is an enterprise-level EHR solution for agencies with more than 10 users and provides solutions for a variety of service types. Inpatient, Outpatient, Community Based Services, and Medication-Assisted Treatment with medication dispensing functionality and dedicated billing services.

related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.
